jaina:ApexisBlast.NAME: Apexis Blast

jaina:ApexisBlast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards (Affected by jaina:spell_force. )

jaina:ArcaneBlast.NAME: Arcane Blast
jaina:ArcaneBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL jaina:spell_force affects this card !M! times.

jaina:ArcaneBreath.NAME: Arcane Breath
jaina:ArcaneBreath.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies twice.

jaina:ArcaneBrilliance.NAME: Arcane Brilliance
jaina:ArcaneBrilliance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! jaina:spell_force. NL At the end of your turn, lose !M! jaina:spell_force.

jaina:ArcaneExplosion.NAME: Arcane Explosion
jaina:ArcaneExplosion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Draw !M! card.

jaina:ArcaneGate.NAME: Arcane Gate
jaina:ArcaneGate.DESCRIPTION: Whenever your play an jaina:Arcane card, deal !M! damage.

jaina:ArcticArmor.NAME: Arctic Armor
jaina:ArcticArmor.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a jaina:Frost card, gain !M! Block.

jaina:Blizzard.NAME: Blizzard
jaina:Blizzard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and jaina:freeze ALL enemies.

jaina:BookOfSpecters.NAME: Book of Specters
jaina:BookOfSpecters.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Discard all non-Attack cards drawn this way.

jaina:BreathOfSindragosa.NAME: Breath of Sindragosa
jaina:BreathOfSindragosa.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and jaina:freeze a random enemy.

jaina:CabalistsTome.NAME: Cabalist's Tome
jaina:CabalistsTome.DESCRIPTION: Add 3 random non-Rare spell cards into your hand. NL They cost 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

jaina:Cinderstorm.NAME: Cinderstorm
jaina:Cinderstorm.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all *Burns in your hand. NL Apply !M! jaina:Combustion for each card exhausted this way.

jaina:Combustion.NAME: Combustion
jaina:Combustion.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! jaina:Combustion to all enemies not targeted by this card.

jaina:ConeOfCold.NAME: Cone of Cold
jaina:ConeOfCold.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !B! Block.

jaina:ConjureManaBiscuit.NAME: Conjure Mana Biscuit
jaina:ConjureManaBiscuit.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Mana *Biscuit that grants [E] [E] into your hand.

jaina:Counterspell.NAME: Counter Spell
jaina:Counterspell.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Choose one: NL Gain 1 Intangible, 1 jaina:Buffer, or 1 Artifact.
jaina:Counterspell.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose one: NL Gain 1 Intangible, 1 jaina:Buffer, or 1 Artifact.

jaina:DeckOfWonders.NAME: Deck of Wonders
jaina:DeckOfWonders.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! *Scrolls *of *Wonder to your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

jaina:DeepFreeze.NAME: Deep Freeze
jaina:DeepFreeze.DESCRIPTION: jaina:Freeze ALL enemies. NL Whenever you jaina:freeze an enemy, gain [E] and draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.
jaina:DeepFreeze.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: jaina:Freeze ALL enemies. NL Whenever you jaina:freeze an enemy, gain [E] and draw 1 card.

jaina:DragonsBreath.NAME: Dragon's Breath
jaina:DragonsBreath.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Costs 0 if your hand has only jaina:Fire.

jaina:DragonsFury.NAME: Dragon's Fury
jaina:DragonsFury.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL jaina:Burnt: *X.

jaina:Duplicate.NAME: Duplicate
jaina:Duplicate.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card. Add a copy of it into your hand. NL You may not choose another copy of this card to be copied.
jaina:Duplicate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card. Add 2 copies of it into your hand. NL You may not choose another copy of this card to be copied.

jaina:Evocation.NAME: Evocation
jaina:Evocation.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! jaina:spell_force.

jaina:ExplosiveRunes.NAME: Explosive Runes
jaina:ExplosiveRunes.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target is a *minion, deal double damage. NL If this kills a *minion, any overkill damage is dealt to ALL enemies.

jaina:FirstFlame.NAME: First Flame
jaina:FirstFlame.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add a *Second *Flame into your hand.
jaina:FirstFlame.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add a *Second *Flame+ into your hand.

jaina:FlameLance.NAME: Flame Lance
jaina:FlameLance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this deals unblocked damage, apply !M! jaina:Combustion. NL jaina:Burnt: *1.

jaina:FlameWard.NAME: Flame Ward
jaina:FlameWard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked, apply !M! jaina:Combustion to ALL enemies.

jaina:Flamecannon.NAME: Flamecannon
jaina:Flamecannon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL jaina:Combustion: *1.

jaina:Flamestrike.NAME: Flamestrike
jaina:Flamestrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies twice. NL jaina:Burnt: *2.

jaina:FontOfPower.NAME: Font of Power
jaina:FontOfPower.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! [E] . NL (Affected by jaina:spell_force. ) NL Exhaust.

jaina:ForbiddenFlame.NAME: Forbidden Flame
jaina:ForbiddenFlame.DESCRIPTION: Deal X times !D! damage. NL jaina:Burnt: *X.

jaina:FrostAffinity.NAME: Frost Affinity
jaina:FrostAffinity.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next jaina:Frost card cost 2 less [E] . NL Exhaust.
jaina:FrostAffinity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next jaina:Frost card cost 2 less [E] .

jaina:Frostbolt.NAME: Frostbolt
jaina:Frostbolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and jaina:freeze an enemy.

jaina:FrozenClone.NAME: Frozen Clone
jaina:FrozenClone.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain Block equal to their damage intent X times.
jaina:FrozenClone.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain Block equal to their damage intent X+1 times.

jaina:FrozenTouch.NAME: Frozen Touch
jaina:FrozenTouch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and jaina:freeze an enemy. Exhausts after being played !M! times.

jaina:HotStreak.NAME: Hot Streak
jaina:HotStreak.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! jaina:Combustion to an enemy. NL If the last card played this combat was a jaina:Fire card, gain [E] .

jaina:IceBlock.NAME: Ice Block
jaina:IceBlock.DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next instance of lethal damage you would take.

jaina:IceLance.NAME: Ice Lance
jaina:IceLance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a jaina:frozen enemy. NL If the target is not jaina:frozen, jaina:freeze it and exhaust.

jaina:IceShard.NAME: Ice Shard
jaina:IceShard.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! *Shards into your hand. NL Exhaust.

jaina:IceShardToken.NAME: Shard
jaina:IceShardToken.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a jaina:frozen enemy. If the enemy is not jaina:frozen, jaina:freeze it instead. NL Exhaust.

jaina:IceWall.NAME: Ice Wall
jaina:IceWall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each enemy in combat.

jaina:Icicle.NAME: Icicle
jaina:Icicle.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL Deal !D! damage if the enemy is jaina:frozen.

jaina:IncantersFlow.NAME: Incanter's Flow
jaina:IncantersFlow.DESCRIPTION: The first card you play each turn cost 0.

jaina:MagicTrick.NAME: Magic Trick
jaina:MagicTrick.DESCRIPTION: jaina:Discover a non-Rare card that costs 1. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
jaina:MagicTrick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: jaina:Discover a non-Common card that costs 1. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

jaina:ManaBind.NAME: Mana Bind
jaina:ManaBind.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next jaina:Arcane card is played twice.
jaina:ManaBind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next !M! jaina:Arcane cards are played twice.

jaina:Meteor.NAME: Meteor
jaina:Meteor.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! jaina:Combustion to EVERYONE.

jaina:MirrorEntity.NAME: Mirror Entity
jaina:MirrorEntity.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the enemy's attack intent amount. NL Exhaust.
jaina:MirrorEntity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the enemy's attack intent amount.

jaina:PrimordialGlyph.NAME: Primordial Glyph

jaina:PrimordialGlyph.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: jaina:Discover an upgraded non-Common spell card. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

jaina:RayOfFrost.NAME: Ray of Frost
jaina:RayOfFrost.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target is jaina:frozen, apply !M! Vulnerable.

jaina:Scorch.NAME: Scorch
jaina:Scorch.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! jaina:Combustion. NL Increase the jaina:Combustion of ALL *Scorches by 2 this combat.

jaina:ScrollOfWonder.NAME: Scroll of Wonder
jaina:ScrollOfWonder.DESCRIPTION: jaina:Autoplay: NL Create a random card and play it. Draw a card. NL jaina:Purge.

jaina:SecondFlame.NAME: Second Flame
jaina:SecondFlame.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

jaina:ShatteringBlast.NAME: Shattering Blast
jaina:ShatteringBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL jaina:Frozen enemies.

jaina:ShiftingScroll.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Retain. NL When this is in your hand, transform it into a random spell at the start of each turn.
jaina:ShiftingScroll.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Unplayable. Retain. NL When this is in your hand, transform it into a random spell at the start of each turn.

jaina:ShootingStar.NAME: Shooting Star
jaina:ShootingStar.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

jaina:Simulacrum.NAME: Simulacrum
jaina:Simulacrum.DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! card from your draw pile. NL Add a copy of that card with Exhaust into your hand.
jaina:Simulacrum.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! cards from your draw pile. NL Add a copy of those cards with Exhaust into your hand.

jaina:SplittingImage.NAME: Splitting Image
jaina:SplittingImage.DESCRIPTION: After you are attacked, gain !M! Intangible.

jaina:SpringWater.NAME: Spring Water
jaina:SpringWater.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Whenever you draw a Skill, gain [E] .

jaina:TomeOfIntellect.NAME: Tome of Intellect
jaina:TomeOfIntellect.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 jaina:spell_force for every !M! cards in your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

jaina:Vaporize.NAME: Vaporize
jaina:Vaporize.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked, deal that much damage to the attacker.

jaina:Wildfire.NAME: Wildfire
jaina:Wildfire.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply jaina:Combustion, apply 3 more.
jaina:Wildfire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply jaina:Combustion, apply twice as much.

jaina:Wish.NAME: Wish
jaina:Wish.DESCRIPTION: Choose a spell card to add into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
jaina:Wish.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose an upgraded spell card to add into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

jaina:WizardArmor.NAME: Wizard Armor
jaina:WizardArmor.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block. (Affected by jaina:spell_force. )
